result.execSummary:
The defendant Arturo X Lemus was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Arturo X Lemus in court with Attorney J Anthony Rosario.  Pablo Galaviz appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called for sentencing hearing.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Rosario makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  WITHHELD SENTENCE:   

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR   *CONCURRENT*

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
____Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
____No VIOLENT contact with: victim or any family members

COSTS:  $243.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation)


COUNT #2:   WITHHELD SENTENCE:   

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR   *CONCURRENT*

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
____Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
____No VIOLENT contact with: victim or any family members

COSTS:  $243.00 (to be paid as a condition of probation)

CONDITION TIME:  30 Days,  Non-working hours with standard release conditions - STAYED - to be used at agent's discretion

***Expunction is conditionally granted upon verification of completion of sentence, payment of all costs/fees and no new criminal law violations***
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.
Sentencing hearing at 01-21-2016 03:30 pm

Defendant Arturo X Lemus in court with Attorney J Anthony Rosario.  Stephen Joseph Centinario appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State files an amended information.  Defendant enters a no contest plea to Counts #1 & 2 on amended information.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Counts #1 & 2.  Attorney Rosario requests a sentencing date.  Court adjourns for sentencing.    Bail remains as fixed.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 21, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
Filed by the State. Witness list attached.
